### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install openmpi+pmi %gcc@5.4.0 schedulers=slurm
...

==> Searching for binary cache of openmpi
==> Finding buildcaches on http://spack.pi.sjtu.edu.cn/mirror

on.

==> Using cached archive: /lustre/home/rpm/spack/var/spack/cache/openmpi/openmpi-4.0.0.tar.bz2
==> Staging archive: /lustre/home/rpm/spack/var/spack/stage/openmpi-4.0.0-3l72yhmlqa3l5zhpt4xhqa4iqu6mfqik/openmpi-
4.0.0.tar.bz2

==> Building openmpi [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/lustre/home/rpm/spack/opt/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0
/openmpi-4.0.0-3l72yhmlqa3l5zhpt4xhqa4iqu6mfqik/bin/shmemrun'
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux mu04.pi.sjtu.edu.cn 3.10.0-514.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Nov 22 16:42:41 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.3.1611 (Core)
```

title: Installation issue: openmpi-4.0.0 due to absence of shmemrun in install phase
